deshapalana padanama matha samruddhi prathilabhin thoragath aakarayenma deshapalana padanama matha pathwim lada samruddhi niyamakawarun, kalamanakaruwan athulu niladharin aarambhaye sitama akhanwa shrilanipa deshapalana kriyakarin lesa rujuwa kriyakala bawath kisiwekuta pahasuwen bahara kala nohakiya. 1995 sita samruddhi wishayabhara amathiwaraya wu es.bi. disanayaka mahatha ema yugaye di ‘‘chanda mashima’’ lesa bauthisma laba sitiye da laksha 20k pamana wana samruddhi prathilabhin ha dasa dahasakata adhika samruddhi niladharin pahasuwen hasirawimata lada aanubhawasampanna hakiyawa nisaya.
